description: Meet Ashton!As the scene opens, Ashton -- a new find of Kaden's -- says he's already having a 'great' time with us, and this is something he's been thinking about doing for a while. Kaden says he's been conversing with Ashton for a while, warming him up to the idea of getting in front of the camera. So clearly, all that sweet talking from Kaden finally worked!Ashton says he's about 5'8' tall 'on a good day,' and weighs in at around 155 lbs. He's a northern boy, and enjoys going out to the beach and hitting the clubs. (He's says he's got the 'moves.' Kaden tries to get him to show off his dancing skills, but Ashton's a bit too shy to bust out a dance number for us.)You'll have to see how things progress in the scene, but I think Ashton's a winner and has a great personality. Check him out!
title: Ashton
